item.title: Update?
item.author: invalid@example.com (SteelKiller)
item.dc:creator: SteelKiller
item.content:encoded: Its been a year or two since i last asked. but here it is again. is there any news on when the next version of this will be released and which version of UT will it be on UT2004 or UT3 ? anything but a smart alec reply will do. if i can ill help you guys i am a 3d modeler.

item.title: Welcome to the Team Orbit forums
item.author: invalid@example.com (Twrecks)
item.dc:creator: Twrecks
item.content:encoded:
I'd like to welcome the community to these forums created for Team Orbit, here at BeyoundUnreal!

Team Orbit is a group of talented emebers of the community working on various projects using the Unreal Engine. From Code to Content, we pride ourselves in mastering many of the development tools used in the gaming industry. It is our goal to deliver a quality mod while increasing the skill sets of our members.

In the future we will be sharing our visions with the best Unreal community on...

Welcome to the Team Orbit forums

item.title: Heya ! :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hillgiant)
item.dc:creator: Hillgiant
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone, just wanted to drop in and say hello, i dissapeared a while back because my pc died and it took me quite a while to get another one unfortunately. Anyway I just wanted to let everyone know what happened to me and say hello and best wishes. I was reading Agent x's thread, and want to say grats to Agent on becoming a dad I am also a new dad myself and have a four month old daughter now!Kinda crazy, I never thought I would be a dad but its a great experience. Anyway I just...

Heya !

item.title: Agent-X says hello
item.author: invalid@example.com (Agent-X)
item.dc:creator: Agent-X
item.content:encoded:
It is me, John. Its been a long while since we last talked. I thought I would say hi, and wish everyone at Team Orbit, Happy Hollidays. I am also here to ask how you have been and how things are going? I am now a VFX 3D Artist. Interesting how it turned how out like you said I will probably be working on movies one day. I am also a father now. Feel free to contact me back through email or here at the forrum, or instant messengers.

John Inman

item.content:encoded:
howdy.

i was wondering... could we possibly see a DEEP beta by the end of the year?
it would be real nice.....*makes puppy face*

item.title: would like to ask some questions to the maker of NEO CAIRO
item.author: invalid@example.com (basics)
item.dc:creator: basics
item.content:encoded:
would like to ask some questions to the author of NEO CAIRO...
im a coder for unreal tournament and would like to know if the code for unreal tournament is public releast or not....why i want to know this is the following....
i think this mod is verry nice it contains lots of nice new meshes and brushes and would like to know if i can use these for my own weapons .
afcourse i would NOT take credit for them and would add a txt with the credits to team orbit for whatever i used telling i...

would like to ask some questions to the maker of NEO CAIRO

I want go foward... I want do a next step into future... You know what I want to say? My FanArt - now 4 all!!!

item.title: Forum downtime
item.author: invalid@example.com (SandRock)
item.dc:creator: SandRock
item.content:encoded:
As you probably know BeyondUnreal had a couple of hard drive failures and as thus the forums are set back to may 2006's backup. This means that all posts and threads after that are gone.

Not to worry, you'll be seeing it fill up with new stuff soon enough

item.title: How's everyone doing?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Comrade Jerkov)
item.dc:creator: Comrade Jerkov
item.content:encoded:
Yes, as I said in another thread, I come and go like a shifting wind. It helps keep things interesting for when I am around.

I see a lot of new faces here, new projects, too. So I figured I should reintroduce myself, as I expect everyone (even the SandRock boomerang) has forgotten me by now

So, for what little use, worth or interest I am around here, I'm here to have my bi-monthly poke around

~Ash

item.title: NKOTB: HeavyArmor
item.author: invalid@example.com (Heavy_Armor)
item.dc:creator: Heavy_Armor
item.content:encoded:
I've been a member for a week and a half... Very impressed by it all; very excited to be a team member.

My expert-tease lies in Drawing, 3D max, video compositing & effects.

My goal is to become proficient at everything I do not yet know how to do.

I am, perhaps, too excited to be amongst a group of people I can really "talk shop" with about graphics and games and technique. The novelty of the situation leads me to jabber and question incessantly at times, but bear with me and...

NKOTB: HeavyArmor

item.title: Hello!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Angel_Mapper)
item.dc:creator: Angel_Mapper
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone! I'm going to be joining Team Orbit to work on the Bodyweapon project. I've been working with the Unreal engine for six years, three of those professionally. For the last year I've been doing work at home for a few different companies, most recently with Epic for the Mega Bonus Pack.

Looking forward to working with all of you!

item.title: UT2004 TO community party
item.author: invalid@example.com (SandRock)
item.dc:creator: SandRock
item.content:encoded:
Anybody interested in fragging some in UT2004 this coming weekend,

perhaps saturday starting around 11pm GMT+1 10PM UTC, 1PM Pasific Time (LA), 4pm Central time, 5pm Eastern time?

Its the latest I would be able to play for a couple of hours.

Just wondering if anyone would like too, I reinstalled UT2004 today

Vehicle CTF would be nice!

item.title: Another new member here!
item.author: invalid@example.com (BioSnark)
item.dc:creator: BioSnark
item.content:encoded:
Hey all, I'm new to the team too, SysytemShock told me to get in touch with Agent-X, and apparently I've got what it takes to be on the team, so here I am.

I've worked on the projects Eternal Damnation and AW7 both for Postal 2. I am mainly a skinner, but I am also learning modeling, and I can do web design.

item.title: Newteam Member SystemShock
item.author: invalid@example.com (SystemShock@dls.pipex)
item.dc:creator: SystemShock@dls.pipex
item.content:encoded:
Hi gang ,I am System Shock I have just Joined the team..

I am from the Postal 2 communty being very active over the last two years....
I am a level designer and modeller, I can also rig pawns, and have just made my first steps into coding, stuff like pick-ups, weapons and pawn code.

If you need anything, just shout.

item.title: Ahem...
item.author: invalid@example.com (ThunderBear)
item.dc:creator: ThunderBear
item.content:encoded:
As promised, we post it in here first.
Team Orbit is now going into production: http://bodyweapon.com

Worry not, Orbit Wars will soon follow.
And yes, we are still very much a part of this community.
After all, NeoCairo is still in production.

Party on...

item.title: CTF-OSR-Gladius
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sjosz)
item.dc:creator: Sjosz
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys, I thought I'd go and show you what I've been up to not mapping for NeoCairo. My entry in the Old School Rulz mapping competition is complete, and is a public download now. Since I'm part of this team now, I just can't pass up the opportunity to show some of my work. The thread info has been copied from the INA forums because I'm too lazy to come with another thread. Feedback is very welcome, and when the vote system is up on UnrealPlayground, please vote for my map if you like it...

CTF-OSR-Gladius

item.title: No Worries...
item.author: invalid@example.com (ThunderBear)
item.dc:creator: ThunderBear
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone. I know we've been quiet for a month. Thank you for your patience. Amazing things are happening at Team Orbit right now. Things that we have not yet been able to speak publicly about. So stay tuned to our site. We will be making our public announcement right here, very soon.

Party on...

item.title: greetings
item.author: invalid@example.com (Azrael)
item.dc:creator: Azrael
item.content:encoded: I'm glad to be on the team. Thank you everyone for the warm welcomes and for letting me join the team. I met Mario through Eric Huelsman/DocHoliday, one of the bosses of Studio Arts, a school for animation. I can't wait to work with everyone and to learn and grow with you all as well.

Hey Everybody,
My name is Josh, nicknames are jdgill, or zombe. I do concept art and....I love drawing

item.title: Greetings
item.author: invalid@example.com (M3anBONE)
item.dc:creator: M3anBONE
item.content:encoded: Hello, everyone. My name is Orville and I'm one of the new members of Team Orbit. I look forward to working along side everyone and hope to contribute as much as possible to your talented team and its projects.
